title: Sci-fi World Swarm - Ambient Loops
description: Invade distant alien worlds and experience the sound of their home lands, planets & more! Welcome in, Sci-fi World: Swarm - a designed game ambience loop library inspired by an alien insect race.
longDescription:
Audio Demos

This loop library includes an assortment and variety of over 140 location specific ambience loops, and loop-able layers which gives you the ability to orchestrate your games background sound with ease.

Sci-fi World Swarm features a heavy 1.51 GB collection of high quality seamlessly loop able ambience loops and includes over 2 hours of sound. This is a library geared towards multiplayer space, fantasy, RPG, MMO, and sci-fi games and showcases sounds like creepy tunnels, planets, hatcheries, engine rooms, wind, tones, flowing elements.

Each loop is around 1 minute in length and includes 1-2 alt mix versions for each main ambience loop. This allows you to orchestrate your games background sound how you want it. If the full loop has too much going on, then try using the minimal version without the sound you don’t like. The loops are mixed and mastered to high volume so don’t be afraid to mix the sounds back in your mix to get optimal immersion and sonic dynamics. 

If you didn’t know, Sci-fi World Swarm is the second installment of the Sci-fi World ambience loop library series. All of the recordings are royalty free and delivered in .WAV 44.1kHz/16bit, giving you the best quality for heavy sound editing, pitch shifting, and fx processing while keeping a top notch level of clarity and precision. Need more ambience loops? Be sure to check out Swarms sisters sound libraries - Sci-fi World Colony and Sci-fi World Guardians.

Explore new worlds, create immersive game atmospheres, in-game moments and enjoy scene setting loops and tones with Sci-fi World Swarm.
technicalDetails:
Product details:

  • 141 game ready loop-able assets
  • 1.51 GB of ambience samples
  • All in 44.1k 16bit .wav
  • Sci-fi Ambience Loop Library
  • Over 2 hours of sound
  • Includes a variety of locations, tones and ambiences
  • Perfect for games, room tones, and film
  • Includes embed Soundminer metadata
  • 24 ambiences loops like alien cave, energy lab, hangar, sub bay & more
  • 49 minimal versions or alt mixes of full loops
  • 68 loop-able layer loops like Queens Chamber, Termite Mounds, Insect Engines & more!
  • All royalty free
  • RTU-OTB (ready to use out of the box)

Number of Audio Waves: 141

Number of Audio Cues: 141

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAVs

Do Sound FX loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 120+ Minutes

Supported Development Platforms: Windows, Mac, PS4, iOS, Android, Xbox One, Oculus, SteamVR / HTC Vive, Gear VR, Linux, HTML5

Supported Target Build Platforms: Windows, Mac, PS4, iOS, Android, Xbox One, Oculus, SteamVR / HTC Vive, Gear VR, Linux, HTML5

Documentation: Content List
